document.full_text: netflix inc said on friday it has secured exclusive rights to the 26-episode television series "house of cards," in what signaled a move away from its traditional role of merely licensing movies and tv shows.
document.title: netflix secures first rights to spacey tv series
lines_and_colors: netflix inc said on friday it has secured exclusive rights to the 26-episode television series "house of cards," in what signaled a move away from its traditional role of merely licensing movies and tv shows.
